text: Mba gumgi gu mbigi mben pani havhargim, mbe bigi mbararargeŋ vuzvugi fhuvara. Mbe vhɨra wari wo khuari pɨngiap, mbe vhɨra won rɨmgi pɨngi. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgirga fhu, mbe wo rimgir mba bigi ganɨv, wari wo khuarir mba bigi mbararav, nta ndɨɨriveŋ kaŋgirga. Mbe ndavi domdorɨv, nan han zɨrim, gu mben muuŋrim, mbe nzerarga.” ’ ”
